Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Ast with a black lappet-wig, a yellow face with black details, a red, yellow and blue collar, unmarked hands, the front of the legs are inscribed with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground with a black border, the body is painted white.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
